mentor.browseAndConnect: Browse and connect with experienced mentors in your field
mentor.nicknameHelp: Different from forum username, you can modify your nickname
mentor.availability: Times when you can accept consultations
mentor.availabilityExample: e.g., Weekdays 9am-5pm EST, Flexible on weekends
mentor.availabilityPlaceholder: e.g., Monday, Wednesday, Friday evenings 8-10pm US Western Time
mentor.bioHelp: We recommend disclosing your background and capabilities while maintaining personal privacy, to help people in need make better choices
mentor.allowReviews: Paid consultants will write reviews and ratings for your service. Please confirm you accept this.
mentor.allowRecording: Both parties have the right to record calls. Please confirm you accept this. If you have privacy concerns, please use voice-changing software.
mentor.validationReviewsRequired: You must accept this term to continue
mentor.validationRecordingRequired: You must accept this term to continue
mentor.createSubtitle: Share your expertise and help others grow
mentor.setupInstructions:
Want to provide career mentoring services on our platform? Please fill in the information below to register as a mentor. Here's how it works:

• Once your profile is saved, job seekers can see your basic information on the "Find a Mentor" page.
• Job seekers can send you mentoring requests with their introduction and preferred mentoring times.
• You can accept or reject requests within 48 hours. Requests that are not processed within 48 hours will be automatically cancelled.
• After accepting a request, you can have one-on-one private chats with the job seeker to confirm mentoring times, payment methods, and meeting links.
• You and the job seeker will have a one-on-one career mentoring session at the agreed time.
• After the mentoring session, the job seeker can leave a review of your service.
mentor.validationNickname: Nickname must be at least 2 characters
mentor.validationBio: Bio must be at least 10 characters
mentor.validationLevel: Select at least one mentoring level
mentor.validationPayment: Select at least one payment method
mentor.validationAvailability: Availability must be at least 10 characters
mentor.validationExpertiseDomain: Select at least one professional domain
mentor.validationExpertiseTopic: Select at least one area of expertise
mentor.customTopicsHint: Press Enter or click "Add" to add a tag
